params.target: address to be given rights to transfer and destination of the call.

params.amount: the number of tokens allowed to spend.
params.target: destination of the call, allowed to spend the amount specified

approveAndCall(address,uint256,bytes).notice: approve `target` to spend `amount` and call it with data.

paidCall(address,uint256,bytes).notice: temporarly approve `target` to spend `amount` and call it with data. Previous approvals remains unchanged.
